name: Four Hunters Survivor
description:
Step into the shoes of four fearless hunters to survive countless hordes of enemies, you can play with:

Knight: An excellent melee combatant.
Archer: Always ready to finish off everyone from a distance.
Mage: Scholar of powerful magic.
Cleric: With light and healing spells, prepared for survival.

Get ready to see:


  • Four maps, namely the forest, the snow, the desert, and the dungeon.
  • 30+ Different enemies for you to fight.
Exclusive abilities for each hunter.
  • Mysterious merchant who will sell you improvements.
